casebody.data:
Appeal of JULIUS HENRY COHEN. Docket No. 1437. Submitted February 2, 1925; decided February 13, 1925. Carl A. Mapes, Esq., for the taxpayer. B. G. Simpich, Esq. (Nelson T. Hartson, Solicitor of Internal Revenue.) for the Commissioner. ' Before James, SteRnhagen, Trammell, and Teussell.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
